\# About Me

An Ecosystem Science and Sustainability major with a strong interest in carbon management. While in school, I have been involved in research projects on bat conservation, working on data collection and analysis. In professional settings, I bring analytical thinking to contribute to sustainability initiatives and ecological research. I seek to apply my expertise in organizations focused on environmental sustainability and leverage my core competencies:

-   Data collection and analysis

-   Ecological research methods

-   Science communication
